text: Pamwe Tenzi vake, kana iye akakurambai, vanogona kumupa vamwe vakadzi vasiri imi, vari nani kudarika imi, maMuslim (vanozvipira kuna Allah), vatendi, vanoteerera (Allah), vanokumbira Allah ruregerero, vanonamata Allah nemoyo wese, vanotsanya (kana vakatama munzira yaAllah), vakamboroorwa uye mhandara
